Articles.Content:
Sector 7 Space Laboratories VTOL Division - Sub Zero

Sub Zero

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Assembled with an MK2 Cockpit, 10 Whiplash Engines, 6 On the Belly, 4 On the Stern, 32 XM-G50 Radial Air Intakes, 2 Advanced Inline Stabilizers. Craft comes with a Fuel Cart.

Flight Operations:

Engage RCS and SAS, throttle up to full then press spacebar for the Lift Engines to engage and a second time for Rear Engines to engage after leaving ground level. When Landing use the downward thrusters to help control your descent.

Flight Controls

1-Lift Engines

2-Rear Engines

3-Vertical Landing Lights

4-Runway Landing Lights

5-Effects Lighting

Craft File

Sub Zero

- - - Updated - - -

My inspiration Craft

http://ersguild.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2014/09/8b645bfb-d3d8-4276-9758-615e63ec04c4.jpg
I like the way this craft is curved. Does it affect handling much? Also, that is an impressive number of engines!

Yes it does affect the handling, I wanted them to be curved more, it was twisting too much. Tried flying without the tail fins and that was also not working I like making crafts that require lots of throttle.

Edited October 23, 2015 by castille7
